<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_doc_participant</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_doc_participant">signature_heightISNOTEMPTY^signature_height<=0^NQsignature_widthISNOTEMPTY^signature_width<=0^EQ<item endquery="false" field="signature_height" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="signature_height" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="<=" or="false" value="0"/> <item endquery="false" field="signature_width" goto="false" newquery="true" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="signature_width" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="<=" or="false" value="0"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Validate signature height and width</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
if (current.signature_height <= 0) current.signature_height.setError(gs.getMessage("Signature height must be positive")); if(current.signature_width <= 0) current.signature_width.setError(gs.getMessage("Signature width must be positive")); current.setAbortAction(true);
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-01-08 06:20:25</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>0c817146c3e12010324cc3b87d40dd4e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Validate signature height and width</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Document Templates" source="sn_doc">6a9ea833b763330088d9bc78ee11a88q</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Document Templates">6a9ea833b763330088d9bc78ee11a88q</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0c817146c3e12010324cc3b87d40dd4e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-01-11 09:58:10</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0c817146c3e12010324cc3b87d40dd4e"/> </record_update>
